The Arm pit--er Arm Band radio ready for a sweep board. I used an o=
n board 3 volt (Lm317) regulator to power the radio, the power button is sh=
orted, and there's a button added across the band switch. Very little modif=
ication has to be done to radio.  You can add an external AM wire ante=
nna, as with the 12-469. 
 The onlyest draw back--$35!
 
At 3 sec=
onds "hows that ofr a ghost box?", and at 11 seconds "be done Princess" . T=
his was manually tuned with a 9 volt battery and a 100K volume control.
